Bedek HaBayit on Torat HaBayit HaAroch

schema.heTitle: בדק הבית על תורת הבית הארוך
schema.key: Bedek HaBayit on Torat HaBayit HaAroch

enDesc: Written by Rabbi Aharon Halevi (Ra’ah), Bedek HaBayit on Torat HaBayit HaAroch is a criticism of the Rashba’s work. The Rashba answered the critique in his book Mishmeret HaBayit.
enShortDesc: 13th-century critical commentary of the Re’ah on the Rashba’s manual on kashrut, niddah, and mikvah immersion.
heTitle: בדק הבית על תורת הבית הארוך
